name: Oroborascion, Etherym of Time Eternal
text:
3 "Etherym" monsters
This monster is unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects. You can only use the following effects of "Oroborascion, Etherym of Time Eternal" once per turn. If your opponent would Summon a monster (Quick Effect); You can banish 1 monster you control or in your GY: negate the Summon and if you do, banish that monster. If this monster is banished: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it.
